page.title: 11CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: {ROUNDERS} This is played with two teams, a bat and a ball. One team bowls and fields the ball while the other team bats. The batsman hits the ball as far as he can and runs past several posts around the outside of the game area. He stops when the fielding team retrieve the ball. If he is between posts, he can be 'out' if a fielder hits the next post with the ball before he can reach it. The team take it in turns to bat, adding 1 point for each uninterrupted run round the course. A team is out when either no-one is left in to bat or one of the fielding team catches the ball before it reaches the ground. When a team has built up a score of 5 rounders, we play that they can buy back a player who has been caught out.
